body:
Comment 2: 
% for t in $(find -name '*_test.go'); do grep -q 'func Example' $t && grep -H -m 1
'^package' $t; done | grep -v '_test$'        
./src/pkg/go/parser/parser_test.go:package parser
./src/pkg/crypto/des/des_test.go:package des
./src/pkg/crypto/sha1/sha1_test.go:package sha1
./src/pkg/crypto/md5/md5_test.go:package md5
./src/cmd/go/testdata/example1_test.go:package p
./src/cmd/go/testdata/example2_test.go:package p

Note that go/parser is a false positive.
